snippet: Mitt Romney’s campaign released a blistering television advertisement on Thursday accusing President Obama of dishonesty in recent attacks on Mr. Romney.
abstract: Text and assessment of television ad released by Mitt Romney's presidential campaign that accuses Pres Obama of dishonesty in his attack ads.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s campaign released a blistering television advertisement on Thursday accusing President Obama of dishonesty in recent attacks on Mr. Romney.

headline.main: Accusing Obama of Untruths Over Outsourcing
headline.print_headline: Accusing Obama of Untruths Over Outsourcing
